  "frontend/src/App.tsx": "Main application component with TanStack Router setup defining all routes including the new /import route and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster for notifications.",

  "frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx": "Equipment list page with search input filtering by equipment #, tag number, name, location, manufacturer, model, and serial number, discipline dropdown filter, distinct empty states for no equipment vs no search results, edit/delete actions per row, and EquipmentNameDropdown in edit dialog with corrected backend parameter mapping.",
  "frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx": "Spare parts management page with three tabs (Create, View by Equipment, Search) supporting file attachments with upload/download/remove functionality, advanced search filters for equipment tag number, model/serial, part number, and manufacturer with cross-equipment results display, and SparePartNameDropdown for part name selection in both create and edit forms with corrected ConfirmDialog usage.",
  "frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx": "Cataloguing page with template-based attribute forms, edit mode that loads existing records into the form for updates, and delete confirmation for cataloguing records.",
  "frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx": "Maintenance records page with create form and view table, including edit and delete actions for each maintenance record with proper status badge rendering, confirmation dialogs, and additional information field support.",
  "frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx": "Documents page with file upload functionality and document listing, including edit action to update document type and additional information, and delete action with confirmation for removing documents.",
  "frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx": "Reports screen with three tabs (Equipment List, Spare Parts by Equipment, Maintenance Due) displaying data in tables with export to CSV and PDF functionality for each report.",

  "frontend/src/components/forms/FormField.tsx": "Reusable form field wrapper component providing consistent label styling, required indicator, help text, and error message display for all forms.",
  "frontend/src/components/EquipmentLookup.tsx": "Reusable equipment lookup dropdown component with type-to-filter capability using an overlay input that filters equipment by number, tag number, and name without changing the selected value, showing \"No equipment matched the filter\" when no results.",
  "frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "React Query hooks for all backend operations, adapted to work with the actual backend interface by using updateEquipment/updateSparePart/updateMaintenanceRecord for creates, client-side filtering for searches, and client-side aggregation for reports.",
  "frontend/src/lib/dates.ts": "Date utility functions for converting between backend Time (bigint nanoseconds) and JavaScript Date objects, plus formatting dates for display.",
  "frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts": "Client-side cataloguing template definitions for mechanical, electrical, instrumentation, and piping equipment with dynamic attribute fields (text, number, select inputs).",
  "frontend/src/lib/exports.ts": "Export utility functions for generating CSV and PDF files client-side from report data, plus a new downloadCSVTemplate helper for generating import templates.",
  "frontend/src/lib/validation.ts": "Form validation helper functions for required fields, numbers, and email addresses with error message generation.",
  "frontend/src/index.css": "Global styles with OKLCH color system using warm earth tones (browns/ambers at hue 25) for primary palette, avoiding blue/purple, with proper light and dark mode support.",
  "frontend/tailwind.config.js": "Tailwind configuration with custom color tokens, Inter font family, custom border radius, and extended utilities for the asset management application design system.",
  "frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.tsx": "Reusable confirmation dialog component built with shadcn AlertDialog for delete confirmations with customizable title, description, and action buttons.",
  "frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts": "Actor initialization hook with enhanced logging and sanity checks to verify critical backend methods exist, helping diagnose production deployment issues.",
  "frontend/src/lib/errors.ts": "Enhanced error normalization utility that detects backend configuration errors (missing methods, reject code 5), extracts user-friendly messages from trap errors, and provides helper functions to identify authentication and backend mismatch errors.",
  "frontend/src/components/AccessControlInitBanner.tsx": "Banner component that displays access-control initialization errors with retry and re-authentication options.",
  "frontend/src/lib/files.ts": "Shared utility functions for converting browser File objects to ExternalBlob with upload progress tracking and formatting file sizes for display.",
  "frontend/src/pages/ImportPage.tsx": "Import page with tabbed interface for Equipment and Spare Parts CSV imports, file selection, preview, validation, batch processing with per-row error reporting using normalized error messages, template downloads with correct parameter order, equipment lookup helper for spare parts import, and import results display with backend configuration error detection.",
  "frontend/src/lib/csvImport.ts": "CSV parsing utilities with support for quoted fields, row-level validation for Equipment and Spare Parts, date parsing to bigint time, and bigint number parsing helpers.",
  "frontend/src/lib/importMappings.ts": "CSV column mapping definitions and transformation functions for Equipment and Spare Parts imports, including template headers, field aliases, and discipline enum conversion.",
  "frontend/src/lib/productionChecks.ts": "Production runtime verification utilities that check if the backend actor has required methods like updateEquipment and provide user-friendly error messages for missing backend functionality.",
  "frontend/src/components/HeaderAuthControl.tsx": "Reusable header authentication control component that displays a Log in button when not authenticated and a Log out button when authenticated, with loading states, error handling via toast notifications, and special handling for \"already authenticated\" errors.",

  "frontend/src/lib/staticNameLists.ts": "Static lists of equipment and spare part names transcribed from the provided image for use in dropdown autocomplete suggestions.",
